import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core';
import { OrderService } from '../services/create-task-service/order.service';
import { Order, Campus, Status } from '../models/Order';
import { ToastrService } from 'ngx-toastr';
import { Router } from '@angular/router';
import { CategoryService } from '../services/category.service';
import {Location} from '@angular/common';


@Component({
  selector: 'app-create-task',
  templateUrl: './create-task.component.html',
  styleUrls: ['./create-task.component.css']
})
export class CreateTaskComponent implements OnInit {
  departments = [
    'Logistieke diensten',
  ]




  selected = 'option2';
  campusen = Campus;
  selectedCampus: string;
  public campusenOption = [];
  public order: Order = new Order();
  Categories: String[] = [];
  public  userId = localStorage.getItem("UserID");
  public userName = localStorage.getItem("UserName");
  constructor(private os: OrderService, private toastr: ToastrService, private router: Router, private categoryService : CategoryService, private _location: Location) { }


  ngOnInit() {
    this.campusenOption = Object.keys(this.campusen);
  }

  onChange(Campus) {
    this.selectedCampus = Campus;
    console.log(this.selectedCampus);
  }


  /**
   *  Deze functie voegt een nieuwe task toe door de functie "createOrder()"
   *  binnen de "OrderService" aan te roepen
   */
  createOrder() {
    this.order.status = Status.OPEN;
    this.os.createOrder(this.order,this.userName,this.userId).subscribe(res => {
      console.log('added succesfully');
      this.toastr.success('Bedankt !', 'Task wordt toegevoegd');
      this.router.navigate(['/']);
    }, error => {
      this.toastr.error('Er is een Error');
    });
  }


  /**
 * deze function call backend function om Alle  Categorie vanuit database te halen
 *
 */
onDepartmentChange(e){
  console.log(e.target.value);
  const department = e.target.value;
  this.categoryService.getCategoriesBydepartment(department).subscribe(res => {
    //console.log(res[0].categories);
    this.Categories = res[0].categories;
  }, error => {
    console.log(error);
  })
}

goBack(){
  this._location.back();
}


}

<div class="contailer">
  <div class="jumbotron">
      <h2>Create task</h2>
      <form #orderForm="ngForm">
        <div class="form-row">

          <div class="form-group col-md-5">
              <label for="campus">Campus</label>
              <select #campus="ngModel" [(ngModel)]="order.campus" (change)="onChange($event.target.value)" name="campus" id="campus" class="form-control" required>
                <option selected disabled>kiezen...</option>
                <option *ngFor="let key of campusenOption"  [value]="key" [label]="key">{{key}}</option>
            </select>
            <div class="alert alert-danger" *ngIf="campus.invalid && (campus.dirty || campus.touched)">Campus is required</div>
          </div>

          <div class="form-group col-md-3">
              <label for="location">Locatie</label>
              <input #location="ngModel" [(ngModel)]="order.location" type="text" class="form-control" name="location" id="location" placeholder="BV:02.05" required>
              <div class="alert alert-danger" *ngIf="location.invalid && (location.dirty || location.touched)">Location is required</div>
          </div>

          <div class="form-group col-md-2">
            <label for="date">Datum</label>
            <input #date="ngModel" [(ngModel)]="order.date" type="date" class="form-control" id="date" name="date" placeholder="date" required>
            <div class="alert alert-danger" *ngIf="date.invalid && (date.dirty || date.touched)">Date is required</div>
           </div>
           <div class="form-group col-md-2">
            <label for="time">Tijd</label>
           <input #time="ngModel" [(ngModel)]="order.time" type="time" class="form-control" name="time" id="time" placeholder="" required>
           <div class="alert alert-danger" *ngIf="time.invalid && (time.dirty || time.touched)">Time is required</div>
          </div>


      </div>

      <div class="form-row">
          <div class="form-group col-md-6">
            <label for="title">Titel</label>
            <input #title="ngModel" [(ngModel)]="order.title" type="text" class="form-control" name="title" id="title" placeholder="Titel" required>
            <div class="alert alert-danger" *ngIf="title.invalid && (title.dirty || title.touched)">Title is required</div>
          </div>

          <div class="form-group col-md-3">
            <label for="department">Department</label>
            <select #department="ngModel" [(ngModel)]="order.categoryDepartment" id="department" name="department" class="form-control" required (change)="onDepartmentChange($event)" placeholder="kies een afdeling">
              <option selected disabled>kiezen...</option>
              <option  *ngFor="let d of departments" [value]="d">{{d}}</option>

             </select>
            <div class="alert alert-danger" *ngIf="department.invalid && (department.dirty || department.touched)">Department is required</div>
        </div>

        <div class="form-group col-md-3">
            <label for="categorie">Categorie</label>
            <select #category="ngModel" [(ngModel)]="order.category" id="categorie" name="categorie" class="form-control" required placeholder="kies een afdeling">
              <option selected disabled>kiezen...</option>
                <option  *ngFor="let c of Categories" [value]="c">{{c}}</option>

          </select>
            <div class="alert alert-danger" *ngIf="category.invalid && (category.dirty || category.touched)">Categorie is required</div>
        </div>
      </div>

          <div class="form-group">
            <label for="description">Beschrijving</label>
            <textarea #description="ngModel" [(ngModel)]="order.description" class="form-control" id="description" name="description" rows="3" required></textarea>
            <div class="alert alert-danger" *ngIf="description.invalid && (description.dirty || description.touched)">Description is required</div>
        </div>

          <button (click)="createOrder()" type="submit" class="btn" [disabled]="!orderForm.valid">Indienen</button>
      </form>
      <div id="return" (click)='goBack()'>
        <i class="fa fa-undo m-2" aria-hidden="true"></i>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

@import '~bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.css';

.lable {
  color: rgb(206, 0, 0);
}

  background-color: white;
  margin-top: 20px;
}

.btn {
  float: right;
  color: white;
  background-color: #af0412;
}

.form-group {
  flex-wrap: nowrap;
}



[type="date"] {
  background:#fff url(../../assets/images/calendar.png)  97% 50% no-repeat ;
  background-size: 25px;
}
[type="date"]::-webkit-inner-spin-button {
  display: none;
}
[type="date"]::-webkit-calendar-picker-indicator {
  opacity: 0;
}


[type="time"] {
  background:#fff url(../../assets/images/time.png)  97% 50% no-repeat ;
  background-size: 25px;

}

[type="time"]::-webkit-inner-spin-button {
  display: none;
}
[type="time"]::-webkit-calendar-picker-indicator {
  opacity: 0;
}


#return {
  width: auto;
  height: auto;
  font-size: 20px;
  color: white;
  background-color: #af0412;
  position: fixed;
  bottom: 20px;
  right: 20px;
  border-radius: 50%;
  z-index: 10;
  cursor: pointer;
}
